sentences.en: Do you know the legend of the Cowhand and Weaver Maid ?
sentences.cn: 你知道牛郎和织女的传说吗？

sentences.en: He holds a match for Mr. Weaver's cigarette.
sentences.cn: 他拿出一根火柴给韦佛先生点烟.

sentences.en: I really don't know. I'll ask Mr. Weaver if he'll see you later.
sentences.cn: 我一点也不知道. 我去问问韦佛先生是不是以后再见你.

sentences.en: Light and shade come in swift alternation ; Days and months flash by as quickly as a weaver's shuttle.
Mr Weaver talks with her while she sharpens her pencils.
sentences.cn: 她一面削尖铅笔,韦佛先生一面跟她谈话.

sentences.en: Mr. Weaver dictates several more letters, then Arlens goes to her typewriter and transcribes them.
sentences.cn: 韦佛先生又口授了几封信, 艾琳就走到打字机去誊清.

sentences.en: Mr. Weaver is in conference just now. What do you wish to see him about?
sentences.cn: 韦佛先生正在谈事. 你见他有什么事?

sentences.en: Mr. Weaver stretches, yawns, rises reluctantly and plods heavily into the bathroom.
sentences.cn: 韦佛先生伸伸懒腰打了个呵欠, 勉强起床,迈着沉重的脚步走进浴室去.

sentences.en: Mr. Weaver, here is that memorandum you dictated to me last night.
sentences.cn: 韦佛先生, 这是您昨天晚上叫我笔录的那封便笺.

sentences.en: On his way out to lunch, Mr. Cunningham stops at Mr. Weaver's office.
sentences.cn: 康宁海先生出去吃午饭的时候, 顺便到韦佛先生的事务所.

sentences.en: Poison from the weaver fish causes paralysis, swelling, and nausea.
sentences.cn: 龙的毒素会引起瘫痪、肿胀和恶心。

sentences.en: Sasae Weaver cattle days, on the ground, but I and Seoul.
sentences.cn: 天有牛郞织女, 地上金童玉女, 唯吾与尔.

sentences.en: Shall I make out a check, Mr. Weaver?
sentences.cn: 我给他开个支票吧, 韦佛先生?

sentences.en: She was a fast weaver and the cloth was very good.
sentences.cn: 她织布织得很快,而且布的质量很好.

sentences.en: This increases weaver efficiency and leads to higher overall fabric quality.
sentences.cn: 这不仅提高了织造效率,而且保证了织物的高质量.

trans.tran_cn: 织工，编织者，[鸟]织巢鸟，[虫]豉豆，织网蜘蛛
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to weave cloth
